data.name: Song in the Smoke
data.description:
Battle strange beasts and brave the elements to stay alive in Song in the Smoke: an expansive and mysterious VR survival game set in a world outside of time.

Song in the Smoke puts survival in your hands. Enter a dangerous world and craft weapons, make clothes, build fires, and brew potions to defend yourself against vicious predators. Block, parry, and strike back with your club, attack from distance with your bow, or use your wits to sneak past the lethal creatures that call this land their home. 

The hunted also becomes the hunter. Use your senses to stalk prey in virtual reality: track their smell, follow their footprints, and plan your strike. When you’re ready, show off your skill with intuitive and responsive VR controls that let you execute the perfect shot.

Travel between wildly different environments as you follow the guidance of your ancestors, and uncover the secrets of Song in the Smoke.

changelog.change_log:
Fix for Jake mode. 
Fix for burning of bows
Put back functionality to pause game when Oculus dash is open
New options for accessibility and to address user feedback. Various bug and balancing fixes.

This patch introduces a number of quality of life changes, as well as numerous fixes.

Bug Fixes
-- Missing stone issue has been resolved (save data with missing stones should be repaired by this patch)
-- Camp not re-loading correctly when returning to a level through a different entrance
-- Burning of clothing
-- Lord creature showing at the wrong location on the map
-- Fixed stamina drain caused by teleporting whilst wielding a melee weapon
-- Numerous other minor issues


Additions/ Improvements
-- Slightly increased length of day
-- Ability to lure predators with meat which has had lure added
-- Longbow stat tuning
-- Animated canopy shadows on terrain
-- Quality levels to more item types
-- Quality levels propagate from raw items to crafted items
-- In world popups show you the quality of items
-- Added degradation of clothing and its bindings (when clothing falls off it is because their bindings must be replaced)
-- Knife and Billet degradation tweaks
-- Higher frequency drop rates for the rarer stones
-- Tuning for fire management
-- Harvesting animals now also degrades the knife
